005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.impl.DayTimeDurationItemImpl;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
013
014import java.time.Duration;
015
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
017
018/**
019 * An atomic Metapath item containing a duration data value in days, hours, and
020 * seconds.
021 */
022public interface IDayTimeDurationItem extends IDurationItem {
023  /**
024   * Get the type information for this item.
025   *
026   * @return the type information
027   */
028  @NonNull
029  static IAtomicOrUnionType<IDayTimeDurationItem> type() {
030    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DAY_TIME_DURATION.getItemType();
031  }
032
033  @Override
034  default IAtomicOrUnionType<IDayTimeDurationItem> getType() {
035    return type();
036  }
037
038  /**
039   * Construct a new day time duration item using the provided string
040   * {@code value}.
041   *
042   * @param value
043   *          a string representing a day time duration
044   * @return the new item
045   * @throws InvalidTypeMetapathException
046   *           if the provided string value is not a day/time duration value
047   *           according to ISO 8601
048   */
049  @NonNull
050  static IDayTimeDurationItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
051    try {
052      return valueOf(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DAY_TIME_DURATION.parse(value));
053    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
054      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
055          null,
056          String.format("Invalid day/time value '%s'. %s",
057              value,
058              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
059          ex);
060    }
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Construct a new day time duration item using the provided {@code value}.
065   *
066   * @param value
067   *          a duration
068   * @return the new item
069   */
070  @NonNull
071  static IDayTimeDurationItem valueOf(@NonNull Duration value) {
072    return new DayTimeDurationItemImpl(value);
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
077   *
078   * @param item
079   *          the item to cast
080   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
081   *         cast to this type
082   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
083   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
084   */
085  @NonNull
086  static IDayTimeDurationItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
087    try {
088      return item instanceof IDayTimeDurationItem
089          ? (IDayTimeDurationItem) item
090          : valueOf(item.asString());
091    } catch (IllegalStateException | InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
092      // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
093      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
094    }
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * Get the items wrapped value as a duration.
099   *
100   * @return the wrapped value as a duration
101   */
102  @NonNull
103  Duration asDuration();
104
105  /**
106   * Get the "wrapped" duration value in seconds.
107   *
108   * @return the underlying duration in seconds
109   */
110  default long asSeconds() {
111    return asDuration().toSeconds();
112  }
113
114  @Override
115  default IDayTimeDurationItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
116    return cast(item);
117  }
118
119  /**
120   * Compares this value with the argument.
121   *
122   * @param item
123   *          the item to compare with this value
124   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
125   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
126   */
127  default int compareTo(@NonNull IDayTimeDurationItem item) {
128    return asDuration().compareTo(item.asDuration());
129
130  }
131
132  @Override
133  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
134    return compareTo(cast(item));
135  }
136}
